page.title: 04A DAY IN THE LIFE OF VICKI
page.content: On a Saturday my brother and I are usually the first ones to get up to watch T.V.We watch cartoons like Scooby Doo and Donald Duck and then we get dressed.When all my family is ready we have our breakfast then Tony takes the dog a walk over the fields. When he comes back we get in the car and go to Burton shopping centre.First we go to the supermarket then the paper shop and get some sweets for Saturday night because my mum and Tony go out to the pub.Then we have some chips from the chipshop for our lunch. When we have eaten them we go home.My brother and I go out to play with our friends,while Tony digs the garden and puts tomatoe plants in and all kinds of seeds like radish. After dinner we go to the skittle alley at the Black Horse pub.Then I go home and watch Aufwiedershen Pet on TV.
